app.name: DomestIQ
app.tagline: Indlela lephephile nalehlakanipha yekuxhumanisa tisebenti nemindeni
search.title: Tfola Tisebenti
consent.title: Imvume yeBufihlakalo
consent.message: Sicokelela futsi sisebentise lwatiso lwakho lwemuntfu ngekwemtsetfo we-POPI Act. Ngekuchubeka, uvuma tindlela tetfu tekulondvolota lwatiso.
landing.hero.subtext: DomestIQ inika emandla tisebenti tasekhaya kutsi titfole umsebenti locinile, lophephile — futsi isite emakhaya kutfola lusito ngekuciniseka. Lucingo kucala. Tonkhe tilwimi ta-11 tase-SA. Tisebenti atikhokhi.
landing.worker.body: Tigidzi tetisebenti tasekhaya eNingizimu Afrika titsembele emavini ekumlomo kutfola umsebenti lolandzelako. Nangabe umcashi akuyekela, kungasho emaviki ungasebenzi. DomestIQ ikushintja loko. Yenta iphrofayili yakho kanye. Utfolakale. Ubhukwe. Ubuyeketwe.
landing.worker.b1_desc: Sekuphelile ngemaviki ungasebenzi. Tfola kubhuka lucingweni lwakho.
landing.worker.b2_desc: Kubuyeketa, tirefurensi, ne-CV yebungcweti lekhula nayo yonkhe imisebenti. Awuphindzi ucale phansi.
landing.worker.b3_desc: Emakhasimende lacinisekisiwe. Yati kutsi usebentela bani ungakefiki.
landing.worker.b4_desc: Kute i-imeyili ledzingekako. Kute kubhala. Cindzetela titfombe bese utsatsa sitfombe.
landing.worker.b5_desc: Bhalisa futsi ukhulume ngesiZulu, isiXhosa, Sesotho, Afrikaans — tilwimi ta-11 tase-SA.
landing.worker.b6_desc: 100% mahhala kutisebenti. Ugcina yonkhe irandi loyitfolako. Kute ikhomishini letsatfwa kuwe.
landing.client.body: Musa kutsembela emavini ekumlomo utsembe lokuhle. Bhrawuza tisebenti leticinisekisiwe, letikaliweko edvutane nawe. Bona umlando wabo wemsebenti, fundza kubuyeketa lokucinisile, futsi uxhumane ngemimizuzu.
landing.client.b1_desc: I-ID ihlolwe, emarekhodhi ebugebengu ahlungwe. Yati kutsi ngubani longena ekhaya lakho.
landing.client.b2_desc: Silinganiso seciniso esivela emakhaya langempela, netirefurensi letibhaliwe longatsembela kuto.
landing.client.b3_desc: Kusesha lokusebentisa GPS. Bona kutsi ngubani lotfolakala endvutane nawe nyalo.
landing.client.b4_desc: Bhuka kanye noma kwesikhashana. Ikhalenda iyahambelana. Tikhumbutso letitentako.
landing.how.ws1_desc: Cindzetela titfombe ukhetse emakhono akho. Kute kubhala lokufunekako.
landing.how.ws2_desc: Emakhaya lasedvutane nawe abona iphrofayili yakho, silinganiso, nekutfolakala kwakho.
landing.how.ws3_desc: Khetsa imisebenti loyifunako. Beka sithedyuli sakho netilinganiso takho.
landing.how.ws4_desc: Wonkhe umsebenti lomuhle uyakutfolela kubuyeketa lokudvonsela umsebenti longetiwako.
landing.how.cs3_desc: Tfumela umlayeto noma ucele kubhuka. Hlela tintfo ngco.
landing.how.cs4_desc: Kubuyeketa kwakho kusite umphakhatsi futsi kubonge tisebenti letinhle.
landing.services.subtext: Kusuka kulusito lwasekhaya kuya kumisebenti yetandla. Tisebenti tibhalisa emakhono ato. Emakhaya atfola loko lakudzingako.
landing.stories.s1_quote: Bengijwayele kulinda emaviki emkhatsini wemsebenti, ngibuta bangani kutsi bayamati yini lomunye. Manje ngitfola kubhuka njalo ngeliviki. Bantfwana bami bangakwati kudla kahle.
landing.stories.s2_quote: Angikwati kufundza kahle kodvwa titfombe nema-ayikhoni kwenta kube lula. Ngatibhalisa ngedvwa lucingweni lwami. Kute lusito lengiludzingile.
landing.stories.s3_quote: Ngaphambili, bengingenabufakazi bekutsi ngiyakhona emsebentini wami. Manje kubuyeketa kwami lokungema-47 kwetinkhanyeti letisihlanu kukhulumela mine. Emakhasimende ayangetsemba ngingakefiki.
landing.stories.s4_quote: Kutfola umsiti lotsembekile bekusho kubuta bangani utsembe lokuhle. DomestIQ ikushintjile loko ngalokuphelele.
landing.stories.s5_quote: Emabheji ekucinisekiswa anginika kuthula kwengcondvo. Ngiyati kutsi ngubani lota endlini yami. Loko kubalulekile uma unebantfwana.
landing.stories.s6_quote: Ngibeka tilinganiso tami ngedvwa. Kute umuntfu lotsatsa incenye. Ngitfole R8,000 ngenyanga leyendlulile ngeDomestIQ kuphela.
landing.cta.body: Sonkhe sisebenti lesiyakha iphrofayili yaso sivula emathuba. Wonkhe umuzi lobhuka ngeDomestIQ wakha kutsemba. Sonkhe, siyakha intfo leNingizimu Afrika ingazange ibe nayo — inethiwekhi yetsemba yemsebenti wasekhaya locinisekisiwe.
landing.footer.disclaimer: DomestIQ yiphulathifomu yekuxhumanisa. Kute budlelwane bemsebenti lobentiwako emkhatsini wabasebentisi.
landing.faq.a1: Yebo, 100% mahhala. Tisebenti tigcina yonkhe irandi letiyitfolako. Asitsatsi ikhomishini emholweni wetisebenti. Iphulathifomu ikhokhelwa ngenkokhelo yesevisi lencane lekhokhelwa ngemakhaya.
landing.faq.q2: Ngabe ngifuna lucingo lwesimathifoni kusebentisa DomestIQ?
landing.faq.a2: Udzinga lucingo lolukwatako kufinyelela i-inthanethi. DomestIQ isebenta kunoma nguliphi ibhrawuza yesimathifoni — Android noma iPhone. Kute kudawunilodwa kwe-ephu lokufunekako. Ungaphindze uyifake kusikirini sakho sasekhaya.
landing.faq.a3: Tisebenti tingalayisha i-ID yato yase-SA nesitifiketi sekungabi nalicala. Lithimba letfu licinisekisa lamadokhumenti bese linika ibheji yegolide lephelele kutisebenti leticinisekisiwe. Tisebenti leticinisekisiwe titfola kubhuka lokunyenti.
landing.faq.a4: DomestIQ ihambisana ngalokuphelele ne-POPI Act. Lwatiso lwakho lwemuntfu lu-enkhripthiwe, alutsengiselwa labanyenti, futsi lwabelwa kuphela ngemvumo yakho lecacile.
landing.faq.a5: Nyalo sisebenta emadolobheni lamakhulu kufaka Johannesburg, Cape Town, Durban, Pretoria, na Port Elizabeth. Siyandzisa kuya emadolobheni langetiwako. Bhalisa nyalo noma indzawo yakho ingakabikho.
landing.faq.a6: Emakhaya asesha tisebenti ngeluhlobo lwesevisi nendzawo, abona tiphrofayili nekubuyeketa, bese abhuka lusuku nesikhatsi. Tisebenti titfola sicelo futsi tingayemukela noma tikhale. Ungaphindze ukhulumisane netisebenti ngco kutsi nikhulume ngeminyenti ngaphambi kwekubhuka.
landing.faq.a7: Ngempela. DomestIQ isekela kubhuka kwekwenta kanye nekwesikhashana. Noma udzinga kuhlanta kwekwenta kanye noma umlimi wensimu wamasonto, sinakho.
landing.faq.a8: DomestIQ isekela tonkhe tilwimi ta-11 letisemtsetfweni taseNingizimu Afrika kufaka siNgisi, isiZulu, isiXhosa, Afrikaans, Sesotho, naletinye. Tisebenti tingabhalisa futsi tikhulumisane ngelulwimi lwato letilutsandzako.
landing.cities.subtext: Tisebenti nemakhaya ayaxhumana emadolobheni lamakhulu. Iyakhula njalo ngeliviki.
landing.cities.not_listed: Awuliboni lidolobha lakho? Bhalisa noma kunjalo — siyandzisa ngekushesha!
landing.pwa.title: Faka DomestIQ kuSikirini Sasekhaya
landing.pwa.desc: Tfola kufinyelela lokushesha ekubhukeni, emilayetweni, nakulokunye.
